results.overview: Two rival race teams, the Teku and the Metal Maniacs, are recruited by Dr. Peter Tezla to race in the fantastic Racing Realms and retrieve the all-powerful AcceleChargers before they fall into the hands of the deadly Racing Drones. Our drivers race through the Storm and Swamp Realms.
results.title: Hot Wheels AcceleRacers: Ignition

results.overview: When Chloe, a young Parisian, decides to take a long-overdue vacation, she has to find someone to look after Gris-Gris, her beloved cat. Everyone, including her gay male roommate, refuses to help her, but she finally makes an arrangement with the elderly Madame Renée, who often watches over other peoples' cats and dogs. However, when Chloe comes back, Madame Renée tells her that unfortunately the cat has been lost, and the unlucky owner goes on a search for her dear animal friend. While looking for the cat, she meets many colorful characters who populate the neighborhood.
results.title: When the Cat's Away

results.overview: Stranded in an alien environment, a community struggles and perseveres to mend itself.
results.title: Abantu

results.overview: Amidst a sea of litigation, two New York City divorce lawyers find love.
results.title: Laws of Attraction

results.overview: Overwhelmed by the present, an entity retreats into a blissful state of nostalgia.
results.title: From One Speck II Another

results.original_title: Hearts of Darkness: A Filmmaker's Apocalypse
results.overview: A chronicle of the production problems — including bad weather, actors' health, war near the filming locations, and more — which plagued the filming of Apocalypse Now, increasing costs and nearly destroying the life and career of Francis Ford Coppola.
results.title: Hearts of Darkness: A Filmmaker's Apocalypse

results.original_title: Pinocchio and the Water of Life
results.overview: How do you save friends and defeat a dangerous villain, if you are just a small wooden boy? And what if, after gaining freedom, your friends don't know what to do with it now?
results.title: Pinocchio and the Water of Life

results.overview: When their regal matriarch falls ill, the troubled Vuillard family come together for a hesitant Christmastime reunion. Among them is rebellious ne'er-do-well Henri and the uptight Elizabeth. Together under the same roof for the first time in many years, their intricate, long denied resentments and yearnings emerge again.
results.title: A Christmas Tale

results.overview: A young artist, imprisoned within the trammels of opium addiction, relives his phantasmagorical courtship with a mysterious Soprano known only as Ligeia. While exploring these opium induced memories, the lines dividing reality and fantasy, memory and hallucination, begin to blur into an indecipherable labyrinth of obsession and despair. Though he is nursed back to health by a new love, the Lady Rowena, the haunting of Ligeia's memories as well as the spirits of Azrael and Nehushtan, continue to plague his mind and soul.
results.title: Edgar Allen Poe's Ligeia

results.overview: A petty thief is put on trial for the attempted murder of a lawyer. Through a series of flashbacks, the intertwining lives of the thief, the lawyer, and the thief's defense lawyer are illustrated.
results.title: Awaara

results.overview: A fairy godmother helps a princess disguise herself so she won't have to marry her father.
results.title: Donkey Skin

results.overview: Anna Karenina, the wife of a Russian imperial minister, creates a high-society scandal by an affair with Count Vronsky, a dashing cavalry officer in 19th-century St. Petersburg.
results.title: Anna Karenina

results.overview: A documentary that brings to light the vision that director George A. Romero had for an adaptation of Resident Evil, using newly filmed interviews with those who were there, and unravels the secrets behind why it was never produced.
results.title: George A. Romero's Resident Evil

results.overview: A tale of an occidental merchant, Kaspar Almayer, whose dreams of riches for his beloved daughter, Nina, collapse under the weight of his own greed and prejudice.
results.title: Almayer's Folly

results.overview: Seth and Jonah are twins with a dangerous ability: telekinesis. Things start to spiral out of control as their classmates die in twisted and bizarre ways. Jealousy begins to divide them and soon they can no longer trust each other, leading up to a horrific battle against themselves.
results.title: Seconds Apart

results.original_title: Marvel Studios Assembled: The Making of She-Hulk: Attorney at Law
results.overview: Join the likes of Tatiana Maslany, Mark Ruffalo, Tim Roth, and Benedict Wong as they reveal how Marvel Studios’ She-Hulk: Attorney at Law was conceived and shaped. Discover what it took for She-Hulk’s creators to pull off the show’s tricky tone and deliver Marvel Studios’ first truly comedic series – one that boldly breaks the fourth wall to acknowledge its own audience, no less!
results.title: Marvel Studios Assembled: The Making of She-Hulk: Attorney at Law

results.overview: Two teenage best pals attracted to the same boy end up scrambling his life after he walks into a door and is knocked unconscious.
results.title: Hana and Alice

results.overview: Penrod Schofield's mischievous dog, Duke, is falsely accused of biting Penrod's spoiled friend, Rodney.
results.title: Penrod and His Twin Brother

results.overview: A woman grieving over the death of her daughter loses grip of reality when she begins to think her girl may still be alive.
results.title: Angel of Mine

results.original_title: ザ・ギニーピッグ2 ノートルダムのアンドロイド
results.overview: A dwarf scientist has his dreams frustrated when his sister becomes seriously ill. Determined to find a way to preserve the essence of his sister after the death, the scientist begins to use humans as guinea pigs in a bizarre experiment.
results.title: Guinea Pig Part 5: Android of Notre Dame
